It would be great to be able to get a more deterministic behaviour, above all while using GPU training, as this would make hyper-parameters tuning much more useful and doable.
Nowadays, using Keras with Tensorflow backend, it can really change quite much from one training to the next. In case that there is already a way to reduce that difference between runs, I would appreciate it if you could provide some documentation.
